name: Raid (itch) (CowboyDev)
description:
ATTACKKKK! What is Raid?

Raid is a base building tower defense game. You are placed in the role of a formally defeated dynasty tasked with reclaiming your former land. You get to choose from a few different backgrounds: 'Wolff (German), Everred (English), Ragnar (Norse)'. These effect your homeland and the final fight between your dynasty and your conquerors.

A thank you:

I'm glad to have you here with us as I distribute my game onto itch.io. I am releasing the game on steam for free as well. I hope you guys enjoy my project/experiment! I tried to cram some cool stuff in there. I really think that everyone should be able to try it for free. Message me or leave a comment on something about the game. I like to pride myself on being in touch with my community so let me know! I would love to eventually see some screenshots of some of your kingdoms on here.

PLEASE DO NOT PAY/TIP :

Seriously, I am not interested in anyone's money. I make games for fun and because it gives me good programming practice. I think game design is one of the hardest, and most rewarding, forms of art (sounds stupid until you've tried it yourself lol)! 

If you want to help out: recommend the game to a friend, every download helps!
